MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA4 postcode area of Renfrew. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out a shutdown at 1:30pm to complete repairs on our underground cable network outside Cockels Loan and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:40pm on Wednesday 21st April 2021
